preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 3200 g of iron powder using an electronic scale. 
 2. Weigh out 400 g of scandium powder. 
 3. Weigh out 200 g of zinc powder. 
 4. Weigh out 800 g of zirconium powder. 
 5. In a clean mixing container, combine all the powders thoroughly using a mechanical mixer for at least 10 minutes to ensure uniformity.
